value: what's up guys doing we they're here
from educating liberals and as far as
anybody who uses social media probably
already knows because it's shoved down
our throats so often June is being
recognized as Gay Pride Month but I'm
gonna tell you why I strongly disagree
with that now before any of you social
justice warriors out there go calling me
who boob just know that I have no
problems with gay people or trans people
never have I just don't think there
should be an entire month dedicated to
who you sleep with in fact I don't think
it should be anybody's damn business
what happens in your bedroom should stay
in your bedroom since when do we start
celebrating sexual preferences as some
sort of accomplishment to be proud of I
could understand if they were fighting
for rights in a country or society that
legitimately oppress them but they're
not they live in America and have the
same rights as every other American
citizen you know what else most people
in America don't care at all if you're
gay they don't that's one of the
beautiful things about living here but
for some reason people on the Left feel
the need to shove their sexual
orientations into your face every chance
they can get oh and they say it's out of
inclusivity oh really
how are you being inclusive when you're
literally separating yourself from
everybody else by screaming and
flaunting how gay you are in fact those
are some of the most annoying people on
this planet the people who see
everything through the lenses of their
own sexual identity whatever happened to
the simple philosophy of judging another
person based on the content of their
character apparently that's been thrown
out the window
oh and what would happen if we invented
a straight white Pride Month would that
be cool too or with that somehow take on
a negative meaning yeah that's what I
thought you know I find it a little
funny you guys don't give a crap at all
about our border or Second Amendment
rising unborn children yeah we're
supposed to celebrate and swoon over who
you decide to get freaky with in the
bedroom no thanks and why is it labeled
as pride anyways attaching pride to
something implies that you work for it
or you accomplish something and most
people will tell you that you're just
born gay so why are you so proud of
something you can't even control in the
first place should I be proud to be over
six feet tall
blond hair blue eyes where's my month
next I see this movement as a desperate
cry for attention and possibly eight
well probably for many people a
justification of their own sin
it's completely shallow extremely
immoral and is facilitating the decline
of our culture now before I end this
video I think it's important that we
don't lump all gay people in the same
category as the ones who are trying to
push this Gay Pride Month garbage in
fact there are a ton of gay people out
there who are sick and tired of the LGBT
community and the movement going on and
they don't want to be recognized as any
part of it at all they would rather be
known and respected for being a good
person regardless of where they sleep
with and honestly that's the way it
should be I respect that so much just
because we have differences doesn't mean
we need to celebrate them and actually
separate ourselves even further that's
all I got for today guys if anyone likes
to support me you can do so at
patreon.com slash see Pharrell thanks
for watching take care and God bless
